name: AUAudioUnitBusArray
desc: The AUAudioUnitBusArray class defines a container for an audio unitâ€™s input or output busses.

items.name: init(audioUnit: AUAudioUnit, busType: AUAudioUnitBusType, busses: [AUAudioUnitBus])
items.desc: Initializes a bus array by making a copy of the supplied busses.

items.name: var count: Int
items.desc: The number of busses in the array.

items.name: var isCountChangeable: Bool
items.desc: Determines whether the array can have a variable number of busses.

items.name: var ownerAudioUnit: AUAudioUnit
items.desc: The audio unit that owns the bus array.

items.name: var busType: AUAudioUnitBusType
items.desc: Determines whether the bus array is for input or output.

items.name: subscript(Int) -> AUAudioUnitBus
items.desc: Returns the bus at the specified index.

items.name: func setBusCount(Int)
items.desc: Changes the number of busses in the array.

items.name: func addObserver(toAllBusses: NSObject, forKeyPath: String, options: NSKeyValueObservingOptions, context: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?)
items.desc: Adds a KVO observer for a given property on all busses in the array.

items.name: func removeObserver(fromAllBusses: NSObject, forKeyPath: String, context: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?)
items.desc: Removes a KVO observer for a given property on all busses in the array.

items.name: func replaceBusses([AUAudioUnitBus])
items.desc: Replaces the current bus array with a copy of the supplied bus array.
